actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to designate Christmas week as "Blood Donor Week".

summary.text: Designates Christmas week from December 26 to December 31, inclusive, as "Blood Donor Week." Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation annually calling for recognition of the importance to medical care of voluntary blood donation.

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate Christmas week as "Blood Donor Week".
